mapper.insert: INSERT INTO uap_sequence_key(`key`, name, value, step, pattern, expired_on, version) VALUES (#{key}, #{name}, #{value}, #{step}, #{pattern}, #{expiredOn}, #{version})
mapper.select: SELECT id, `key`, name, value, step, pattern, expired_on AS expiredOn, curdate() AS today, version FROM uap_sequence_key WHERE `key` = #{key}
SELECT id, `key`, name, value, step, pattern, expired_on AS expiredOn, curdate() AS today, version FROM uap_sequence_key WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, `key`, name, value, step, pattern, expired_on AS expiredOn, curdate() AS today, version FROM uap_sequence_key WHERE id = #{id} FOR UPDATE
mapper.update: UPDATE uap_sequence_key SET value = #{value}, expired_on = #{expiredOn}, version = version + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
